sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Checkout.css'; // Ensure you have a corresponding CSS file for styling const Checkout = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', phoneNumber: '', fullName: '', addressLine1: '', addressLine2: '', city: '', state: '', postalCode: '', country: '', cardNumber: '', expirationDate: '', cvv: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission logic here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; const sampleOrder = [ { name: 'Wireless Earbuds', price: 29.99, quantity: 1 }, { name: 'Smart Watch', price: 199.99, quantity: 1 }, { name: 'Bluetooth Speaker', price: 49.99, quantity: 1 }, ]; const subtotal = sampleOrder.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price * item.quantity, 0); const tax = 0; // Assuming no tax const total = subtotal + tax; return (

Checkout

Complete your purchase by providing shipping and payment details

Shipping Information

Payment Method

Order Review

    {sampleOrder.map((item, index) => (
  • {item.name} - ${item.price.toFixed(2)} × {item.quantity}
    • ))}

Subtotal

${subtotal.toFixed(2)}

Tax

${tax.toFixed(2)}

Total

${total.toFixed(2)}

); }; export default Checkout;
